channel.title: localization using transifex
channel.description:
transifex - It's the thing people like Tor and Tails and lots of others are using to localize their applications.
Apparently there is even a community of volunteers to translate stuff. Can translate application strings as well as the website.
(However, applications and website need to be prepared for website first. Apart from this programming work it takes also organizational work with transifex.)
https://www.transifex.com

item.title: localization using transifex
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Have looked into this (and many other) 3rd Party translation utilities in the past. Sadly their markups are quiet massive: https://www.transifex.com/pricing/

Adding to that, Tails’s Transifex seems to be either broken or not available any more: https://tails.boum.org/contribute/how/translate/with_Transifex/

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic

item.title: localization using transifex
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
transifex - It’s the thing people like Tor and Tails and lots of others are using to localize their applications.

Apparently there is even a community of volunteers to translate stuff. Can translate application strings as well as the website.

(However, applications and website need to be prepared for website first. Apart from this programming work it takes also organizational work with transifex.)

Transifex

Localization Platform for Translating Digital Content | Transifex

Integrate with Transifex to manage the creation of multilingual websites and app content. Order translations, see translation progress, and tools like TM.
